rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a foyer space that aligns with Vastu by facing the east for positive energy.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: An open and airy living area designed in a contemporary style with ample natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom ensuring privacy and calm; oriented towards the north according to Vastu.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Well-designed bathroom with water supply considerations in line with local norms.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen adhering to contemporary design principles and Vastu guidelines regarding placement of water appliances.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A dedicated space for fitness with soundproofing and ventilation systems designed following local building norms.

rooms.name: Study/Utility Room
rooms.description: Multi-purpose room that can serve as a study or storage area, ensuring optimal utilization of space in an irregular plot.
